desc: Draws a circle on the screen.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coord of circle center.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coord of circle center.

args.name: l
args.desc: (false/nil) The circle will be filled, (true) The circle will have only lines (outline).

args.name: c
args.desc: The color of the circle (0-15), defaults to the active color.

args.name: seg
args.desc: The number of the segments used when drawing the circle.

note: The arguments can be passed in a table.
